channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Expert's 'vigorous' method to eliminate toilet stains using household items
item.description: An expert has shared his "golden rule" for removing toilet bowl stains - and it's quick and easy. Bargain hunters will be pleased to know that white v...

item.title: Gurning champion is so good he’s just won it for the eighth year in a row
item.description: The act of pulling silly faces is an art form, perfected over time, with competitors returning year after year to take part.

item.title: Heartbreaking final words of teen boy stabbed to death in Woolwich revealed
item.description: WARNING: DISTRESSING CONTENT A woman who desperately tried to save a stabbing victim has shared his heartbreaking final moments as he lay dying in a p...

item.title: Market town’s art gallery in hot water over very fruity window display
item.description: Artist Poppy Baynam said women who object are probably heterosexual and have never seen a vulva.

item.title: Tesco shoppers issued warning over dozens of 'Aldi Price Match' products
item.description: A new investigation by BBC Panorama has found some items at Tesco contain less of their main ingredient compared to the Aldi equivalent - here is what...

item.title: The ‘nuclear test’ spotted by a satellite nobody’s owning up to 45 years later
item.description: The double flash could have been a nuclear explosion of two to three kilotonnes - equivalent to 2-3,000 tonnes of TNT.

item.title: Martin Lewis explains how anyone born between 1984 and 2006 can get free £1,000
item.description: LISA accounts allow you to save up to £4,000 each tax year - in return, the Government then pays you a 25% bonus on your savings, which means you coul...

item.title: Zoo’s ‘barking’ pandas turned out to be painted dogs
item.description: People have, understandably, asked for their money back.

item.title: Expert says we've been washing bedding all wrong - it's ruining the sheets
item.description: We all know that we should be washing our bedsheets regularly, but it turns out that there's a lot more to it than simply throwing them in the wash wi...

item.title: YouTuber ‘plays with death’ as he enters bear cave moments before it returns
item.description: Influencer Stefan Jankovich is the newest contestant for scariest stunt of the year, as he willingly sits in a bear cave waiting for it the return.
